title: Shutter
synopsis: After killing a young girl in a hit-and-run accident, a couple is haunted by more than just the memory of their deadly choice.

title: Ong Bak 2: The Beginning
synopsis: Tien, the son of Lord Sihadecho -- a murdered nobleman -- is taken under the wing of Chernang, a renowned warrior and leader of the Pha Beek Krut.

title: ATM
synopsis: When a broken ATM dishes out a fortune, a couple who works at the bank vies to see who can recover the most cash -- and the loser must find a new job.

title: Bad Genius
synopsis: A top student gets pulled into a cheating racket with increasingly higher risks and even higher rewards. But she may lose much more than she gains.

title: Ong Bak 3
synopsis: In this supernatural sequel, a warrior whose fate is marked by the tragic murder of his father marks a new chapter in his quest for revenge.

title: Lovesick
synopsis: Love and academics get complicated at an all-male college that happens to be located next to an all-female high school.

title: Alone
synopsis: When Pim and Ploy, twins conjoined at the stomach, are separated, the operation leaves Pim the surviving sister, haunted by Ploy's vengeful ghost.

title: Pee Mak
synopsis: Mak's friends just want to protect him, but his wife Nak won't let a small thing like her own death get in the way of true love in this horror-comedy.

title: Born to Fight
synopsis: When a drug kingpin's goons threaten to bring the country to its knees, a mourning officer must fight back alongside his sister and an athletic team.

title: Coming Soon
synopsis: After screening a bootleg copy of a blockbuster horror film, a projectionist comes face-to-face with ghostly terrors from the big screen.

title: Phobia 2
synopsis: From disfiguring punishments to festering souls, Thai horror masters present five supernatural tales of karma in this sequel to the 4bia anthology.

title: Suckseed
synopsis: When his boyhood crush Ern returns, Ped forms a band with his friend to impress her. Romantic rivalries bloom after the talented Ern joins the group.

title: Heart Attack
synopsis: When a workaholic freelancer pushes himself too hard, he develops a heart condition and loses his desire to work. Is his beautiful doctor the reason?

title: Laddaland
synopsis: When a family moves into an upscale housing development, they encounter a series of paranormal events that drive them to the edge of insanity.

title: I Fine... Thank You... Love You
synopsis: Desperate to go to the U.S. to win back his girlfriend, Yim hires a tutor to teach him English. But things don't go according to plan.

title: Nang Nak
synopsis: In this adaptation of a Thai folk tale, a man returns from war to his family, unaware of a sad secret about what happened to them while he was away.

title: The Teacher's Diary
synopsis: Finding the diary of his predecessor, rural schoolteacher Song falls in love with its author, Ann, and sets out on a winding journey to find her.

title: Oh My Ghost
synopsis: When a skilled but timid chef is possessed by a sassy spirit, her newfound confidence catches the eye of her longtime crush, a culinary hotshot.

title: Bangkok Traffic (Love) Story
synopsis: After an encounter with an engineer working the night shift for the city train, a 30-year-old woman struggles against all odds to pursue true love.

title: One Day
synopsis: When his colleague (and crush) temporarily loses her memory, an overlooked geek seizes the chance to make an impression before she remembers again.

title: The Iron Ladies
synopsis: A volleyball team made up of gay and transgender players surprise their competitors by winning their way to Thailand's national championships.

title: P
synopsis: An orphan girl taught magic by her sick grandma must find work in seedy Bangkok, where unsavory characters run afoul of her increasingly dark powers.

title: The Red Eagle
synopsis: A masked vigilante called the Red Eagle surfaces to take on the city’s festering crime and corruption, but his enemies won't go down quietly.

title: 407 Dark Flight
synopsis: Ten years after surviving a deadly supernatural event, a flight attendant returns to work to find she's aboard the same plane that tried to kill her.

title: Ghost of Mae Nak
synopsis: Frightening folklore from Thailand tells the tale of a displaced spirit whose fury is unleashed when a newlywed couple moves into an abandoned home.

title: The Promise
synopsis: In the wake of the 1997 financial crisis, two teens whose families face bankruptcy make a suicide pact -- but one of them breaks the promise.

title: The Swimmers
synopsis: When Perth falls for his best friend's girlfriend, he sets off a chain of events that will transform all their lives ... and maybe even end one.

title: Yes or No 2
synopsis: No longer university girls, Kim and Pie face new hurdles in their relationship, including work, new friends and other distractions.

title: Vengeance of an Assassin
synopsis: Becoming a cutthroat in order to smoke out his parents' killers, an assassin faces betrayal and becomes a target himself.

title: Girl from Nowhere
synopsis: A mysterious, clever girl named Nanno transfers to different schools, exposing the lies and misdeeds of the students and faculty at every turn.

title: Timeline
synopsis: Firsthand accounts, re-enactments and computer-generated graphics retell in detail Thailand's biggest news stories from the past.

title: The Last Executioner
synopsis: This biopic of Chavoret Jaruboon, Thailand's last gun executioner, portrays a man devoted to both family and work, as well as a passionate musician.

title: Still
synopsis: A haunted hotel, a body in a water tank, a nightclub fire and a prison death comprise four horror tales taken from Thailand's newspaper headlines.

title: Make Me Shudder
synopsis: Teenagers enter a shuttered, allegedly haunted school to taunt the ghosts of a murdered teacher and suicidal teenager rumored to inhabit the premises.

title: Mindfulness and Murder
synopsis: When a homeless boy is slain in a Buddhist temple, a cop-turned-monk spearheads an investigation and uncovers the dark side of his fellow monastics.

title: The Iron Ladies 2
synopsis: The Iron Ladies are now Thailand's national volleyball champions but dissension soon splits up the team, pitting ex-friends against each other.

title: My True Friend
synopsis: A bullied student forms a bond with the leader of a youth gang and discovers the power and meaning of true friendship.

title: The Second Sight 3-D
synopsis: After witnessing a hit-and-run, a man with paranormal abilities searches for the truth while trying to protect the people he loves.

title: Thong Dee Fun Khao
synopsis: After losing a boxing match, a talented Muay Thai fighter leaves home to train with the best. On his quest, he finds friends, foes and lots of action.

title: Bang Rajan 2
synopsis: A small but fierce group of resistance fighters engages in a brutal battle to protect their village from an army of Burmese invaders.

title: Back to the 90s
synopsis: When a teenager is transported back to his parents’ high school days, he has the chance to alter the events that led to their unhappy marriage.

title: Khun Pun
synopsis: Aided by supernatural powers, a charismatic police detective enjoys a long and illustrious career fighting crime in 1940s Thailand.

title: Yes or No 2.5
synopsis: Roommates Wine and Pie find their lives turned upside down when two more ladies move in next door, bringing up past heartaches and new attractions.

title: Train of the Dead
synopsis: Five teenagers on the lam hide out in an empty train. Little do they realize that the train is inhabited by ghosts on their way to final judgment.

title: 15+ ไอคิวกระฉูด
synopsis: With their teen hormones raging, three high school boys help one another explore their curiosity about the opposite sex and love in this raunchy comedy.

title: The Unborn Child
synopsis: A couple and their young daughter are haunted by a paranormal, malicious presence -- which is soon linked to a temple and a series of abortions.

title: Microchip
synopsis: A goofy group of friends stumbles into serious trouble when a gangster's microchip containing top-secret information goes missing.

title: Make Me Shudder 2
synopsis: After bombing their college entrance exams, Nick and his group of teen rebels seek the blessing of a local spirit but end up traveling back in time.

title: Patong Girl
synopsis: While vacationing with his family in Thailand, teen Felix falls hard for beautiful Fai and decides to stay another week, much to everyone's surprise.

title: Make Me Shudder 3
synopsis: A beach-party trip to Phuket turns into a zombie-fighting comic nightmare for a group of bickering teenage friends.

title: Oh My Ghost
synopsis: A group of friends encounters a folk spirit in their apartment, and their harebrained attempts to banish the ghost soon backfire.

title: The Holy Man
synopsis: Formerly a troubled youth, a monk is given charge of a Buddhist temple neglected by superstitious villagers under the spell of a fake psychic.

title: Bangkok Hell
synopsis: When offered a deal to snitch on fellow prisoners, an inmate faces a tough dilemma: act in his own interest, or help those who may need him.

title: Hormones
synopsis: High school students in Bangkok wrestle with issues such as sex, teen pregnancy, drugs, school violence, family turmoil and more in this Thai drama.

title: School Tales
synopsis: Members of a marching band spend the night at their school and set out to discover if the spooky tales they've been told are actually true.

title: Monkey Twins
synopsis: Inspired by Khon dance drama and Thai martial arts, a fighter scarred by the past joins forces with a determined cop to battle an organized crime ring.

title: Ugly Duckling
synopsis: Young women face up to their insecurities and circumstances, finding love and laughs along the way. Featuring a different storyline every season.

title: Holy Man 2
synopsis: Former rap musician Joey Boy is now a monk who takes Father Teng's place at his rural temple, where a crisis develops involving a nearby stone quarry.

title: Ghost Ship
synopsis: Anxious to set sail, boat crew members dispose of a dead body mysteriously hung from their mast. But soon a storm hits -- and a spirit returns.

title: Project S The Series
synopsis: Sports and friendship intertwine in tales of a volleyball team, an autistic badminton player, a skateboarder with depression and an archery-club crush.

title: Bangkok Love Stories: Innocence
synopsis: From a teenage parkour enthusiast to a bawdy widow, an eclectic group of characters find romance in Bangkok's glittering Silom district.

title: Club Friday The Series 6
synopsis: Based on a Thai radio show that gives love advice to callers, this series dramatizes stories of infidelity, love triangles, sexual identity and more.

title: Oh My Ghost 2
synopsis: The spirited trio are back to take on a new ghost-busting adventure at a mens' residence, where spooky secrets lurk around every corner.

title: Oh My Ghost 3
synopsis: After a body is discovered in their building, a vengeful, paranormal presence begins to affect Taew, Mod Dum and Cartoon's business.

title: Oh My Ghost 4
synopsis: Ghosts wreak havoc at the old school, and a student communicates with the spirit while the team reckons with a power struggle.

title: Club Friday The Series 7
synopsis: More confessional tales of love and heartbreak play out in this next installment of the popular Thai TV series based on a real-life call-in radio show.

title: Pahuyut Fighting Beat
synopsis: When profit-seekers threaten to take over a bar in a tourist town, local martial artists put their skills to the test and fight back.

title: Club Friday The Series 8
synopsis: The eighth installment of this popular Thai series, based on a real-life call-in radio show, dramatizes personal stories of romance and heartbreak.

title: O-Negative, Love Can’t Be Designed
synopsis: Five schoolmates who share a blood type navigate the vagaries of friendship, love and university life.

title: Club Friday To Be Continued - The Promise
synopsis: Two young lovers vow to stay friends through thick and thin, but separation tests their bond until fate allows them to reunite.

title: Holy Man 3
synopsis: Two new monks, one of them a former rock music star seeking inner peace, join a temple plagued by thieves who are stealing its valuable holy relics.

title: Club Friday To Be Continued - Friend and Enemy
synopsis: A love triangle spirals out of control, wreaking havoc on a couple's relationship and a friendship between two women.

title: Club Friday To Be Continued - My Beautiful Tomboy
synopsis: A change in sexual identity complicates young Meen's relationships, while memories of a past romance remain fresh.

title: Bangkok Bachelors
synopsis: Three young men leading carefree bachelors’ lives in the city face the trials of true love when they meet three beautiful women.

title: The Judgement
synopsis: After a traumatic incident at a party makes her a target of gossip and derision, a young college student tries to change her school's toxic culture.

title: เกมปลุกผี
synopsis: Ton and Jack, online pranksters famous for daring ghosts to show themselves, must confront real horror when Ton takes a coin from a corpse's mouth.

title: Bangkok Love Stories: Hey You!
synopsis: A loving couple become rivals when Belle opens a fusion bistro next to her ex-boyfriend Kram’s traditional restaurant in Bangkok’s chic Ari district.

title: Ha Unlimited
synopsis: Three comedians launch a company designed to spread happiness far and wide in this Thai sitcom packed with gags, sound effects and special guests.

title: Beauty and the Bitches
synopsis: Beauty pageant contestants from all over Thailand fight for the crown as they contend with drama and intrigue behind the scenes.

title: Blood and Treasures
synopsis: Condemned by a centuries-old vow to protect her kingdom's treasures, an embittered spirit returns to seek justice against the man who wronged her.

title: Fatal Destiny
synopsis: A young man from a humble family is drawn into a life of crime -- and soon confronts a determined cop in hot pursuit.

title: Reality of Dream
synopsis: Five friends from college chase their post-grad dreams of becoming a successful writer, film director, singer, rich wife and out-and-proud hair stylist.

title: Castle of Stars
synopsis: As four couples with different lifestyles go through the ebbs and flows of joy and sorrow, each must learn how to live a good life.

title: The Forest
synopsis: A monk turned teacher befriends a bullied young student, whose life changes when she bonds with a mysterious boy who dwells in a haunted forest.

title: Love Rhythms - Accidental Daddy
synopsis: A successful DJ's bachelor lifestyle is upended by a young woman who claims to be his long lost daughter.

title: The Underwear
synopsis: Virtual and real worlds collide as a group of teenagers who are grappling with matters of the heart cross paths in a cafe and on an anonymous website.

title: แคทอ่ะแว่บ
synopsis: An ad agency intern falls for an assistant director while helping him train a stubborn cat for a high profile commercial.

title: แม่เบี้ย
synopsis: A married man falls for a cultural tour guide, but her mysterious relationship with a supernatural snake may be their affair’s undoing.

title: Kon Kon Kon
synopsis: Explore the stories of ordinary people dealing with extraordinary circumstances in this series that focuses on overcoming obstacles and odds.

title: โรงเรียนผี
synopsis: When a group of students cuts class to tell old ghost stories about their school, the chilling characters in the legends come alive to haunt them.

title: เปรต อาบัติ
synopsis: After being forced to become a monk by his father, a young man develops forbidden feelings for a local woman as haunted forces begin to emerge.

title: รักสุดท้ายป้ายหน้า
synopsis: High school boy Bass shares an accidental kiss with 25-year-old Sa, then becomes determined to win her heart despite the difference in their ages.

title: In Family We Trust
synopsis: When the head of the lucrative family business passes away, his will leaves the clan at extreme odds.

title: Behind the Newsroom
synopsis: Confident and cool under pressure, top news presenter Punchalee meets her match in the conniving Dao, who'll stop at nothing to fulfill her ambitions.

title: 4bia (Phobia)
synopsis: Four directors create short films based on unique fears involving a lonely woman, a princess's corpse, a haunted camping trip and a cursed manuscript.

title: U-Prince Series
synopsis: From a handsome cowboy to a crazy artist and everything in between, these fetching bachelors are finding love while pursuing their educational goals.
